mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id and m.status = '0' left join sys_role r on r.id = rm.role_id and r.status = '0' where r.id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId})

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.query_param, m.visible, m.status, m.perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id and m.status = '0' left join sys_role r on rm.role_id = r.id and r.status = '0' where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and r.id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId}) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
